pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Package for Full Reporting of Interaction Analyses // Produces a publication-ready table that includes all effect estimates necessary for full reporting effect modification and interaction analysis as recommended by Knol and Vanderweele (2012) [doi:10.1093/ije/dyr218]. It also estimates confidence interval for the trio of additive interaction measures using the delta method (see Hosmer and Lemeshow (1992), [doi:10.1097/00001648-199209000-00012]), variance recovery method (see Zou (2008), [doi:10.1093/aje/kwn104]), or percentile bootstrapping (see Assmann et al. (1996), [doi:10.1097/00001648-199605000-00012]).
